item.description:
Join Emily at the Annex Club for a fun evening of Bingo and Entertainment!

Joan Crawford Hosts Bingo with over $2500 in cash prizes, some pretty awesome vacation prizes, and some other cool stuff, too.

Meet Emily outside at 5pm to enter at 5:15.  This early meeting is required since there are No Reservations and you cannot hold a spot for anyone.  (It is prohibitted by those whom run it.) Officially doors open at 6 to start playing at 7, but you will need to be there by 5:15 if you want to be certain to meet up with Emily and the rest of the group.  (Tardy-ness is at your own risk.)

*I will do my best to hold down seats for people who rsvp but can't make it until later* Emily

Admission is $20 which includes the required Booklet of Bingo Games.  Proceeds will go to Charity.

Bingo Dabbers and Extra Bingo games can be purchased for $1 extra Each.

Beverages are purchased on location.  (You CANNOT bring any outside beverages into the club. Not even water. Previous Prices ranged from $1.00 for a bottle of water to $5.00 for a decent size cup of wine. They also have juice, soda, and beer.)

Snacks can be purchased as well, however you CAN bring your own food.  (Just not beverage.)

Bring snacks to share!

The event is CASH ONLY. They don't accept cards, and as far as I know there are no atms anywhere on the premises.

I (Emily) can be reached on my cell 203-812-9243. I am horrible with directions, so please use google maps or something like that to get there.

I will be outside near the entrance until 5:15. I wear glasses, but other than that I look like my picture. If you get there after 5:15, I will be in line, inside.

As was posted above, this event is very popular and gets filled up quickly. Last time I went the line was out the door by 5:30. I think 5 is early enough, but if a lot of people respond to this meetup, I may change the meet time to 4:30 or earlier. We can always tailgate in the parking lot! :)

In fact, anyone who can get there earlier, who wants to tailgate, please let me know.

Pleanty of On-Site Free parking is available.

Look for Emily.  She can be reached at 203-812-9243.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Emily. She can be reached at 203-812-9243.
item.why: "Not your Grandma's bingo. Have fun and win prizes with your hostes Joan Crawford. I hate bingo, and I loved this!" ~Emily
item.name: Drag Queen Bingomania!
